channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:57 Dumping anxiety in Sinelnikovsky District. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 18:57 Dumping anxiety in Sinelnikovsky District. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 18:37 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
